com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui

Interface EmbeddedAnswersEditor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AuthoringField, QuizzesComponent, QuizzesField

    public interface EmbeddedAnswersEditor
extends AuthoringField
    Extension of AuthoringField that allows to use an HTML editor to create questions with embedded open answers within the text. This object has always type equal to AuthoringFieldType.EMBEDDED_ANSWERS_EDITOR Usage: - Create a single instance of this object and give it the HTML editor's document. Use QuizzesComponentBuilder to build the instance. - Use newEmbeddedAuthoringField to create new answer fields. - This class automatically handles cut, paste, drop and key events that could change the number or the order of embedded answers in text. For other events in the HTML editor that could alter the answers, call analyzeHTML after the edition happens.

    • Method Detail

      • analyzeHTML

        void analyzeHTML()
        Analyze the content of the root element searching for changes in embedded authoring (answer) fields. If changes are detected, do the necessary updates to the HTML and to question object.

      • filterHTML

        java.lang.String filterHTML(java.lang.String questionText,
                          EmbeddedAnswersEditorMode mode)
        Make the necessary transformations to HTML before it can be use to be edited in authoring (teacher) stage, or to be rendered in delivery (student) or review stages. This method sets up the proper placeholders in place of embedded answers so it can be correctly handled by the QuizzesComponentBuilder.replaceFields(com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question, com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance, java.lang.Object) method and by this object.
        • Use filterHTML(questionText, EmbeddedAnswersEditorMode.AUTHORING) before setting the question text to the text editor.
        • Use filterHTML(questionText, EmbeddedAnswersEditorMode.DELIVERY) after getting the question text to the text editor. Use the result to persistently save the text.
        • Use filterHTML(questionText, EmbeddedAnswersEditorMode.REVIEW) before the HTML is rendered for teacher or student review.
        Parameters:
        questionText - the HTML string containing the question text with embedded answers.
        mode - The mode to be used.
        Returns:
        The filtered question text.
        See Also:
        QuizzesComponentBuilder.replaceFields(com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question, com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance, java.lang.Object)

      • newEmbeddedAuthoringElement

        java.lang.Object newEmbeddedAuthoringElement()
        Create a new HTML element to be inserted in the text as a placeholder for an embedded answer. This element is a clickable input text/image. When the user clicks it, a Wiris Quizzes Studio is launcher to configure this particular answer.

      • setEditableElement

        void setEditableElement(java.lang.Object element)
        Set the editable Document or element. This method must be called when the HTML editor is ready and every time the editable content is rebuilt.
        Parameters:
        element - The HTML element node (or Document node) root of editable content.
